name: Flying Sharknado
author: Lux
notes: I guess the debate here is my backrow selections. 2 Econs and 2 SRH worked well for me. Econ good for aliens/CA and SRH for the abundance of alien counterdecks everywhere like Hazy/SSA.  3 PR is optimal but not necessary. WOD is still one of the best traps in the game besides SSA atm. To not run FDC in this deck is criminal.
